199059.陥没した大地の中心に 大きな岩が転がっている。\n<pc>は 辺りをじっくりと:
A large rock is lying in the center of the sunken earth. examined the area carefully. To his
surprise, he found what looked like a button at the bottom of the rock! Would you like to press the button?

199061.<pc>は ボタンを押してみた！\n<br>\nなんと 岩の下のほうが パカッと:
pressed the button! To his surprise, the bottom of the rock snapped open and a metal plate-like
object and a note came out from inside!

199063.おめでとう <pc>君。\n無事 ここまで たどり着けたようだね。\n<br>\:
Congratulations . It seems that you made it here safely. I found something in the package with
this note. That is the key to the entrance of my office. If you look at the key carefully, you will be able to
find the location of my office.Pakul P.S. I forgot to mention that this memo and other confidential documents
will be automatically deleted once they are no longer needed.

199065.<pc>は いつの間にか\n機密文書・Ｐ２号が なくなっていることに\n気がつい:
I noticed that has somehow lost the Classified Document ''P2''. I can find out the location of
the office by looking at the Weird Metal Plate, using Key Items!

199066.陥没した大地の中心に 大きな岩が転がっている。\n<br>\nもう一度 ボタンを:
A LARGE ROCK is lying in the center of the sunken earth. I looked again for the button, but for some reason I
couldn't find it anywhere.
